portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: This is my Portfolio that I created using React Js .It shows all My Projects and the skills I have .The elegance of React.js brings dynamism to every section, ensuring fluid navigation through projects, skills, and a seamless contact form  this also contains a direct contact section.

portfolio.title: Task Manager
portfolio.description: A task manager writes, organizes, and rearranges tasks more efficiently. Theis task manager will allow the user to add a task, mark the task as complete, and delete the task.

portfolio.title: Easy Rentn
portfolio.description: This Expense tracker  let users add expenses, sort them into relevant categories, and provide relevant insights, such as the percentage of income spent on various categories (such as food, education, entertainment, bills, and travel).

testimonial.description: Took  a part in Organising and Hosting All sessions in GDSC
Taken the main lead in this club  from writing reports of college events to  writing anchoring scripts.
Have Done Many campings and Green Events
